column1: We use cookies to make your experience better.
column2: Mi koristimo kolačiće kako bi vaše iskustvo bilo bolje.

column1: To comply with the new e-Privacy directive, we need to ask for your consent to set the cookies.
column2: Da bi smo uskladili novu direktivu o e-privatnosti, moramo zatražiti vašu saglasnost da podesite kolačiće.

column1: Cookies are disabled in your browser.
column2: Cookies are disabled in your browser.

column1: Enter the Cookie Lifetime in seconds.
column2: Enter the Cookie Lifetime in seconds.

column1: Enter a valid cookie path. e.g. /
column2: Enter a valid cookie path. e.g. /

column1: Enter a valid domain name. e.g. "subdomain.yourdomain.com", ".yourdomain.com"
column2: Enter a valid domain name. e.g. "subdomain.yourdomain.com", ".yourdomain.com"

column1: Warning: Do not set to "No". User security could be compromised.
column2: Warning: Do not set to "No". User security could be compromised.

column1: When Cookie Restriction Mode is enabled, visitors to your store are notified that cookies are required for full-featured operations.
column2: When Cookie Restriction Mode is enabled, visitors to your store are notified that cookies are required for full-featured operations.
